query.sql:
USE Origin_Main GO
SELECT ast.applicationid, stages.StageID, stages.StageDescription, ast.CurrentStage, ast.Created, ast.CreatedBy, users.UsersFullName FROM dbo.ApplicationStages ast
INNER JOIN dbo.Stages ON ast.StageID = dbo.Stages.StageID
INNER JOIN dbo.Users ON dbo.Stages.CreatedBy = dbo.Users.UserID WHERE applicationid = ||APPID|| ORDER BY ApplicationStageID
